info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 1 at 2:42PM EDT until October 2 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
info.description:
* WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas due to tidal flooding.
* WHERE...In Maryland, Charles and Calvert Counties. In Virginia, King George County.
* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 3 PM EDT Thursday, especially around the time of high tide.
* IMPACTS...At 3.0 feet, water is expected to reach backyards near 9th Street in North Beach, and could approach 9th Street. At 3.5 feet, water reaches yards near Cobb Island and docks near Dahlgren. At 3.0 feet, parking lots near Charles Street in Solomons begin to flood, with several inches of water covering low-lying portions of Charles Street and Williams Street.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides one and a half to two feet above normal. The next high tides at Solomons Island are at 10:33 PM this evening and 10:42 AM Thursday morning. The next high tides at Chesapeake Beach are at 12:15 AM overnight and 12:34 PM Thursday afternoon. The next high tides at Dahlgren are at 10:50 PM this evening and 11:22 AM Thursday morning.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

parameter.value: COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM EDT THURSDAY
